sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer" function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleClick() { navigate(-1); } const placeOrder = () => { console.log('cock') } return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}.

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (
Go Back Your cart is empty
) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} ) }

Order Summary

 Items: ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax: ${cart.taxPrice} Total: ${cart.totalPrice}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
